topic.title: Tor error 13
topic.body: Whe Tor shows a status error 13 errno 13 (permission denied)  is there a way to bypass that to make tor work properly?

1546815090_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnX.body: How about for Android? I have the same issue but it's on the android app only.

> [60](#comment_20_1Ekf2tGQLhG3iifFsuUk9RcBPx26cQmCD1): i've already gave up the app.i'm using termux to run znon my android device maintenant.

I cannot find znon on termux. Lil help?

1548518903_18R6oJZCus9T4yo3u26jvzdd2MR4x.body: My issue is on the android app
Did they say when that option will be available?

I figured out what the issue is all about. the tormanager.py file is set so as to work with the  tor.exe (Windows) and meek-client.exe (Windows). These files are not compatible with Android. Tor won't work on Android because of this.

1548554810_14FYzEqgGYWoDqjvXgHJ5K7hZAEUs.body: You owe me. Here's my address : bitcoin:1AWCF1aRhKaHMm7rvLaPfVwEU9rdtwqPaF?amount=1
You are living in a dream world, Neo. Loll

1548890091_14TR5Msgnb1MBKGayKiDB7j3aFdGr.body: It shows you never used irc lol
